website_summaries.verdict: Asics Noosa FF is a light and comfortable neutral running shoe which, owing to its highly breathable mesh upper, ensures instant coolness in the long runs even during summers. While it may be a little costly for some customers, its overall package and durability make it a wise choice for most runners.
pros: The cushioning maintained by FlyteFoam exceeded expectations of the customers
they were very happy with high comfort level provided by the shoe
Most customers appreciated the light weight of the shoes
the shoes did not tire their feet even during long runs
A few users described their experience of running in Noosa FF as ‘fast’
The shoe enabled them to cover longer than usual distances without getting the expected-level-of tired
A few runners considered the shoe ideal for both the long-distance running and the short-distance sprints
The users admired its breathable mesh upper
a customer mentioned how these shoes kept his feet cool even in the tropical heat
Another runner mentioned that it functioned well as a casual shoe
A user praised the softness and responsive lift given by the sole unit
A runner thought that the shoes were easy were put on
A customer liked the color schemes of the shoe
cons: A few customers thought the shoes were a bit expensive
A customer found it difficult to trust the thin mesh cloth across the toe section
he described the material as flimsy and insubstantial
A runner thought the toe box was a little narrow for his feet

customer_reviews.title: This shoe would be great if they weren't both mis-sized and the toe box ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe would be great if they weren't both mis-sized and the toe box wasn't awful. I have never had a toe box fit me so tightly in the 20 pairs of Asics I've worn over the years. What the heck? These were sent back almost immediately. Plus, I always where a perfect 13 and the 13s I ordered were simply too small. My toe was millimeters away from the end and the plastic toe guard was gripping my big toe. Asics! Wake up and get your fit right!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe! Very comfort and true to size. I run 30-40 miles a week and put 500 miles on these shoes before retiring them. The soles and uppers help up great. This has become my go to running shoe for long runs and track workouts. The shoe is light and provides enough cushion for this longer runs
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: The web around the toes felt like hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable ASICS I’ve ever purchased. Had to send them back. The web around the toes felt like hard plastic. No give. Try before you buy!
customer_reviews.author: JMC311

customer_reviews.title: best I have found yet
customer_reviews.text: best I have found yet!!, i run about 50 miles a week. I have tried just about every shoe Asics makes. feels great on my after a 10 mile run, does not get the marshmallow brick feeling near mile 8. will order 3 more pairs. just so I have them. fit is exact for 11.5
customer_reviews.author: ProcessFawn193

customer_reviews.title: Excellet neutral running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a new pair of running shoes and Noosa FF was excatly what I needed. very confortable, well ventilated and neutral running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: ... to ASICS for a while now and am not disappointed. They fit well
customer_reviews.text: I've been going to ASICS for a while now and am not disappointed. They fit well, are well-made, and are comfortable. When I'm at work, I prefer a combination of sitting and standing at my desk, and so I'm on my feet a lot throughout the day. I rarely experience any aches or stresses.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather feels like running on pillows
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement for the discontinued TriNoosa. These shoes are INCREDIBLY light & responsive. Can’t wait to test them out next season.
customer_reviews.author: ASANDSR

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down one of the finest pairs of running shoes I've ever owned, and that's more pairs than I have fingers and toes.
customer_reviews.author: HeHatesTheseCans

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: True to size super comfortable bought one in each color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Noosa FF shoes and they perform so well! I have trained in them and used them in two Ironman competitions without any discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: Runs one size small.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, runs at least ONE size small. Support is below medium.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Great stability running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, very light and very reasonably priced! Love them
customer_reviews.author: Mishey

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't wear short socks though - all the rest is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Noosa Ff Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Our triathlon staple Noosa FF shoe has been reinvented with our revolutionary FlyteFoam Technology to create a responsive and lightweight ride. The seamless upper construction features a technical mesh that permits sockless wear, while the wet-grip outsole and heel/tongue grips allow for easy on/off access - ideal for triathletes looking to make a quick transition between race stages.
feature_bullets: Discrete Eyelets: Independently placed eyelets disburse lace tension, creating a customized fitting environment and enhanced upper comfort.
Seamless Construction: The use of seamless materials reduces the potential for irritation and friction caused by traditional stitches and seams.
10mm Heel Gradient: Shifts body mass forward reducing strain on lower limbs.
AHAR Outsole: Acronym for ASICS High Abrasion Rubber. Placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability.
